thread.section_title: Store DJ Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Store DJ | storedj.com.au
thread.title: Erik Eilertsen
thread.title_full: Store DJ reviewed by Erik Eilertsen

author: Erik Eilertsen
title: Erik Eilertsen
text: I very specifically ordered the item for my daughter in Kwinana, WA. Only one or two emails included her. I am in Qld and all delivery advisories were sent to me and, fortunately, I was able to fwd them - I would have been happier if they had copied my daughter per my instruction. Also, having her address you might have known that the Kwinana post office would have been a better place to deliver when it changed from door to door to being a collect at PO procedure. Rockingham is quite a way further for her to collect
